used_topics: This is why you feel unmotivated
Why your attention span is getting worse
Your brain lies to protect you
Things your brain does without telling you

used_hooks: This is why you feel stuck.
Your brain lies to you every day.
No one explains this about your mind.
You were never meant to focus like this.
Your attention span isn’t broken — it’s trained.
Your brain lies to you every day.
